lines.text: My boy, if silence is golden, you are bankrupt.
it's wonderful what doctors know. It's what they don't know that kill you.
Murder know no law of relativity.
Now that I'm here, Pop, uh, what type of murder have we got and how soon do you wish me to produce the murderer?
Every time you open your mouth you put in more feet than centipede. Remain here and produce nothing but silence.
[last lines]
[Sheriff Mack is on road driving when Birmingham runs up to him]
Pardon me, Sheriff, but is this the road back to the city?
Yep. It's about three miles straight down that road.
[notices Birmingham running alongside him]
Hey, I didn't know my car had stopped.
You didn't. I just slowed down. Goodbye!
[runs off, overtaking the car]
No barber shaves so close but another barber finds some work to do.
Reckon what he says is what you might call a cutting remark.
If anyone knew where the formula was kept, I would, but I know nothing about it at all.

[to Sheriff Mack]
To get information from him is like putting empty bucket into empty well.
Yeah, he is kind of dried up.

[to suspects]
When it comes to talkin', you people just don't enter into the spirit of the thing!
Strange safety vault, eh, Roth? Both doors wide open to anyone finding that panel in the hall.
Like a spider's web, sir. Easy to get into; impossible to get out of.

[Sarcastically]
And I'm the spider, huh?
Things misplaced sometimes furnish very good clues.
Gentlemen, in this matter of thought I'm sure that I can assist both of you.

[to others]
He reach oversize decision with undersized brain.

[to Eddie]
Relax!
Well, move over troubles - here we come again!

[to Harper over intercom]
I must see you, sir. There's a murderer about the place.

[to Harper]
One of your relatives no doubt.

[over intercom to the front gate]
Hello? Who is there, please?
Police. Open the gate.
Police? But no one called you here.
No, but I... I want to see someone in there. Open up.
You know what, Eddie? I got a theory on this murder.

[chuckles]
That's something I'd like to hear.
Yeah? Well listen. Now, the way I figure this thing out, the murderer must be on the inside; so, what we got to do is...
What?
Stay outside.
You see? That's the way to solve crime. Fast work and especially fast questioning.
If anybody want to live around here they got to do some fast runnin'.
This is way beyond me. Seems to me when folks asked me to run for sheriff, I missed a fine chance to keep quiet.
Please. Pajamas loud enough without you make extra noise.
